main.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

tsConfig.description: The name of the Typescript configuration file.

outputPath.description: The output path of the generated files.

externalDependencies.description: Dependencies to keep external to the bundle. ("all" (default), "none", or an array of module names)

optimization.description: Defines the optimization level of the build.

fileReplacements.description: Replace files with other files in the build.

webpackConfig.description: Path to a function which takes a webpack config, context and returns the resulting webpack config

buildLibsFromSource.description: Read buildable libraries from source instead of building them separately.

input.description: The input directory path in which to apply 'glob'. Defaults to the project root.

ignore.description: An array of globs to ignore.
